job_title: Clerical/Administrative in Burton, East Midlands, England
pros: Always opportunities to learn new things. I recently changed from part time to full time. Pay and holidays are excellent
cons: Nothing that is bad for me working here

job_title: Porter in Burton upon Trent, England
pros: A great sense of support and community, a strong and healthy culture. I thoroughly enjoyed working there at a young age
cons: Can be overworked, issues are often down to a lack of communication or training

job_title: Bank NA in Burton upon Trent, England
cons:
It can be difficult to get shifts covered, so you often feel over burdened;
Some staff can be rude to agency/bank staff, but then you get that wherever you work.

job_title: Senior Independent Director in Barton under Needwood, England
cons: Challenging, financial constraints, travel sometimes difficult
